str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From pais; to train up a child, i.e. Educate, or, discipline.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To condemn, judge worthy of punishment. From kata and krino; to judge against, i.e. Sentence.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
